elements.text: You are meeting a new friend for lunch soon. You have recently been a bit messier when you eat, and you are worried they will judge you. When you begin to eat your food, you notice your new friend is looking at you...

elements.name: Lunch with New Friend_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
